name: Kingdom of Blades
description:
Play as a front line warrior in the Three Kingdoms Period of China. With nothing to depend on but your swords and your courage, you must slash your way through hordes enemies and face off against the most distinguished of generals on your path to fame and glory. Experience the best in VR swordplay and live out the events of the Three Kingdoms.

Game Features
1. A variety of enemies and challenges await you in each level. All paired with dynamic backgrounds and music to bring you an immersive three kingdoms experience.

2. Wield the weapons of notable war heroes to dominate the battlefield. A mixture of duel wielding, shields and special abilities combine to give players the best in VR swordplay.

3.Signature wartime generals await your challenge on the battlefield. Each with their own unique abilities and voice lines, prepare to face off against a few of the most famous warriors in the history of China.

4. Hone your skills and aim for the top of the global leader boards. Who will ultimately claim the title of the King of Blades?

5. Share your story with friends and capture the best moments in combat with the in-game selfie feature. Personalize your social experience by collecting the masks of famous generals to show off your achievements.

6. Discover exciting narrative in a whole new way. With custom cutscenes for each Chapter, you can experience storytelling in VR and learn more about this fabled period in Chinese history.
